thread.title: Assad's Russian ties exposed by kids' holiday

title: Assad's Russian ties exposed by kids' holiday
text:
Assad's Russian ties exposed by kids' holiday 1:39pm IST - 01:08 
The extent of Syrian President Bashar al-Assad's ties to Moscow have been further revealed after its emerged his teenage children vacationed at a Crimean summer camp last year.   
The extent of Syrian President Bashar al-Assad's ties to Moscow have been further revealed after its emerged his teenage children vacationed at a Crimean summer camp last year.  //in.reuters.com/video/2018/04/20/assads-russian-ties-exposed-by-kids-holi?videoId=419505079&videoChannel=13423
